info.sourceTextContent: En el teatro, el general se viene a nuestro palco y está con nosotras un entreacto y un acto entero y a veces hasta dos entreactos. Dice una chuscada; eso sí, limpia siempre y sin olorcillo de cuartel, y mamá se destornilla de risa.
info.suspiciousTextContent: He has a habit of coming to our box when in the theater and stays for one act and perhaps the intermission before and after. He behaves pleasantly while there and is not offensive in his person and causes Mother to laugh
